title: War of the wheels: decoding the different playbooks of Bajaj Pulsar and TVS Apache
text:
By extending the Pulsar brand lower, Bajaj is trying to lure consumers who are downtrading in a weak economy. Though it is a risky strategy, Bajaj can afford to make mistakes unlike its rival TVS Apache. While the race between the brands has certainly intensified, so far it hasn’t hurt either’s profitability.
